body:
A fix for this issue has been included in [Bazel 8.0.1 RC1](https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases/tag/8.0.1rc1). Please test out the release candidate and report any issues as soon as possible.
If you're using Bazelisk, you can point to the latest RC by setting USE_BAZEL_VERSION=8.0.1rc1. Thanks!

A fix for this issue has been included in [Bazel 7.5.0 RC2](https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases/tag/7.5.0rc2). Please test out the release candidate and report any issues as soon as possible.
If you're using Bazelisk, you can point to the latest RC by setting USE_BAZEL_VERSION=7.5.0rc2. Thanks!
